caption.p: The aggression level of each colony pair in the three categories based on the infection status of interacting workers. (−/−) denotes the pair involving both workers from uninfected colonies; (−/+) denotes the pair involving one infected worker, and one uninfected worker; (+/+) denotes the pair involving both workers from infected colonies. The letters indicate the significant differences between group ( p-Value < 0.001).
